author: James Martin
method: Place the fish head and tail into a saucepan along with the vegetable stock, bring to the boil and simmer for 5-6 minutes. Add the remaining ingredients to the pan and simmer for 10-12 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender. To serve, remove the fish head and tail from the soup and discard. Pour the soup into a warm serving bowl.
ingredients: 1 sea bass head,  1 sea bass tail,  300ml/½ pint hot vegetable stock,  50g/1¾oz asparagus, chopped ,  50g/1¾oz tomatoes, chopped ,  1 tsp soy sauce,  1 tsp sesame oil,  100g/3½oz shiitake mushrooms, chopped ,  ½ lime, juice only,  pinch dried chilli flakes
